value.title: Power BI Dashboard Challenge: Executive Dashboards 📊 that Connect Company Systems, by Poorni G.
value.excerpt: What results can a Power BI Beginner get in just 30-Days? Watch Poorni G. show you how she was able to connect various company systems and build executive dashboards for senior management. value.title: Power BI Pivot: Move Data from Rows to Columns #Q&A
value.excerpt: I am a huge fan of Unpivot (moving data from Column to Rows), but sometimes Pivot is your friend, when you need to move data from Rows to Columns. If you're getting this error "There were too many elements in the enumeration to complete the operation. " trying to Pivot in Power BI, watch this video.
